# Draft:All Queens Go to Heaven

| length         =
| guests_title   = Guest judge

}}
"All Queens Go to Heaven" is the third episode of the fifteenth season of ''RuPaul's Drag Race''. It originally aired on January 13, 2023. Maren Morris is a guest judge.
Sasha Colby wins the episode's main challenge, and Princess Poppy is eliminated from the competition after placing in the bottom two and losing a lip-sync against Amethyst.
Episode
is a guest judge.]]
For the episode's main challenge, the contestants produce infomercials for their vision of the afterlife in three teams. Anetra, as the winner of the previous challenge, is the first team captain and chooses Luxx Noir London, Sasha Colby, Salina EsTitties, and Marcia Marcia Marcia. Amethyst, as the winner of the previous episode's lip-sync, is the second team captain and chooses Loosey LaDuca, Aura Mayari, Spice, and Princess Poppy. The remaining contestants (Jax, Malaysia Babydoll Foxx, Mistress Isabelle Brooks, Robin Fierce, and Sugar), form the third team.
(''pictured at RuPaul's DragCon LA in 2023'') is eliminated from the competition.]]
On the runway, the category is "Metallica". In addition to RuPaul and Michelle Visage, Ts Madison is a judge and Maren Morris is a guest judge. Loosey LaDuca, Luxx Noir London, and Sasha Colby receive positive critiques, and Sasha Colby wins the challenge. Amethyst, Jax, and Princess Poppy receive negative critiques, and Jax is declared safe. Amethyst and Princess Poppy place in the bottom two and face off in a lip-sync to "Ain't No Mountain High Enough" by Diana Ross. Princess Poppy is eliminated from the competition.
Reception
Trae DeLellis of The A.V. Club gave the episode a rating of 'B'.
